alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:51AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Goliad and north central Bee Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 351 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tulsita, or 10 miles south of Kenedy, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pettus, Tulsita, Tuleta and Normanna. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 582. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
